tasks.task: Choose between inline and anti-siphon zone control valves for a sprinkler system.
subtasks: Understand the difference between inline and anti-siphon valves.
Determine the need for an anti-siphon valve's built-in backflow protection.
Consider the freeze protection required for anti-siphon valves.
Assess the pipe usage and water pressure equalization with inline valves.
Factor in the protection from landscaping disruption provided by inline valves.
Weigh the testability and certification of backflow prevention with inline valves.
Check local regulations regarding anti-siphon valves' use.

tasks.task: Choose between inline and anti-siphon zone control valves for a new sprinkler system.
subtasks: Understand the difference between inline and anti-siphon valves (including their names and functions).
Determine why anti-siphon valves have built-in backflow protection and when that's necessary.
Consider the installation requirements for anti-siphon valves (above ground, protected from freezing).
Weigh the merits of inline valves in terms of pipe usage and water pressure equalization.
Evaluate the protection provided by inline valves' burial in terms of natural landscaping and infrastructure impact.
Assess the testability and certification of backflow prevention for inline valves versus anti-siphon valves.
Research local regulations about the use of anti-siphon valves, as some areas don't allow them.
